author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police arrested eight persons on Wednesday for posing as Income Tax sleuths and defrauding a man of Rs. 38 lakh.

Police sources said the victim, Ibrahim, had got Rs. 40 lakh after selling his ancestral property. He did not deposit the money at a bank but kept it at home, after having spent Rs. 2 lakh.

His cousin Shahul Hameed, along with three other persons hatched a plan to rob him of the money and got a few other persons to pose as I-T sleuths and ‘raid’ Mr. Ibrahim’s house. The group made away with Rs. 38 lakh.

The gang asked Mr. Ibrahim to retrieve the money from the I-T office. He went there only to realise he had been duped. Subsequently, he filed a complaint. The police arrested eight persons and recovered Rs. 36 lakh.
title: Eight who posed as Income Tax officials arrested
